methods.name: messages.removeChatUser
methods.description: Allows the current user to leave a chat or, if the current user started the chat, allows the user to remove another user from the chat.

parameters.name: user_id
parameters.description: ID of the user to be removed from the chat.

parameters.name: member_id
parameters.description: ID of the member to be removed from the chat (ID of user or -ID of group)

errors.name: ADMIN_REQUIRED
errors.description: Can't kick a chat member: we aren't an admin of this chat

errors.name: USER_NOT_IN_CHAT
errors.description: Can't kick the chat member: they are not in this chat

errors.name: CONTACT_NOT_FOUND
errors.description: There is no entity with this user_id / member_id
